thread.title: CNN Airs ‘LIVE’ Ben Sasse Interview At The Same Moment He’s Questioning Gorsuch On CSPAN [VIDEO]
thread.title_full: CNN Airs ‘LIVE’ Ben Sasse Interview At The Same Moment He’s Questioning Gorsuch On CSPAN [VIDEO]

author: Christian Datoc
title: CNN Airs ‘LIVE’ Ben Sasse Interview At The Same Moment He’s Questioning Gorsuch On CSPAN [VIDEO]
text:
5545522 
CNN broke a huge story Tuesday afternoon: Sen. Ben Sasse has a time machine. 
The Nebraska Republican beamed into the Atlanta-based news network for a “live” interview at 4:44 pm, EST Thursday. 
WATCH: 
While host Jake Tapper never specifically breached the subject of time travel, his questioning invariably led to the discovery of Sasse’s let’s-just-assume-it’s-a-DeLorean, considering he was also spotted at 4:44 pm, EST on C-SPAN 3 questioning Judge Neil Gorsuch during his Supreme Court confirmation hearing. 
WATCH: 
It should be noted that Fox News’ Neil Cavuto was the first to report on CNN’s accidental scoop. 
WATCH: 
“What a hard working guy.” 
WATCH:
